episode_title: How to Do Less, Earn More, and Have Way More Fun with Jessica Miller
transcript:
ï»¿Nik (00:01.218)
Jessica Miller, welcome to Nikonomics. Very excited to have you here. Why don't you just give the people what they want and tell us what your business is and how you make money.


Jessica Miller (00:10.448)
Thank you so much. I'm so happy to be here. So my name is Jess Miller. I run a business called Jessica Miller Coaching. We focus on growth and sales consulting. Our goal is really to help you run your business in the most efficient and powerful way that you can, which means helping you double your revenue the boring way with what you already have in your business so that you can stop chasing clients and money and essentially leverage all the hard work that you have already done and grow your business with ease in that way.


Nik (00:38.136)
Okay, so you're working with business owners. I mean, that's your target demo. You're not necessarily working with, I guess, divisions of large corporations or anything like that. You're individuals who own businesses and want to optimize. What's your background? How did you get into this?


Jessica Miller (00:49.476)
Yes, founders and individuals,


So actually by training, I'm actually a pharmacist that I have at MBA. I worked in the pharmaceutical industry for years and then, yep, that's where I started. I was an executive in the companies helping to build teams and grow different products, really with the idea of getting these lifesaving drugs into the hands of the people that needed them. And I started to realize that I wanted to have a bigger impact. I wanted to help people grow. And then I had a very significant health scare, which ended up shifting my life.


Nik (00:59.33)
No way.


Okay.


Jessica Miller (01:23.386)
to take that plunge of becoming an entrepreneur, which I thought those were special snowflakes. I was not one of them. But I took the leap and I did it. And I started helping people really focus on making money because I think money is an amazing tool to create what you want in the world. And when I started my business, biggest shocker was that so many amazing, capable people had these great ideas in these businesses, but they were making no money.


And when they were making the money, they were making it in a very hard and difficult way. And I just thought, what the heck is going on here? I need to help people with this.

That's a really interesting value proposition. mean, most of the time when I think of coaching, for example, at least the first words that come to my mind aren't, I'm here to help your business make money, right? Like, yes, I'm coaching you, but my ultimate goal, and I'll know if I'm successful,


is if your business makes more money.

Correct, yes, yes. And also holding that, like having benevolence for the business.
